languages.text: "Ткачи Кровавой паутины умываются кровью, потрошат трупы и проводят сомнительные ритуалы... Напомните, чем эти культисты лучше тех, что мы истребляем?"
"These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"
languages.original_text: "Ткачи Кровавой паутины умываются кровью, потрошат трупы и проводят сомнительные ритуалы... Напомните, чем эти культисты лучше тех, что мы истребляем?"

traits.locale_text: "These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"
"These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"

"These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"

languages.text: "Diese Netzspinner baden im Blut, weiden Leichen aus und führen zwielichtige Rituale aus ... Was macht diese Kultisten doch gleich besser als die, die wir töten?"
languages.original_text: "These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Netzspinner baden im Blut, weiden Leichen aus und führen zwielichtige Rituale aus ... Was macht diese Kultisten doch gleich besser als die, die wir töten?"

languages.text: « Les tisseurs se baignent dans le sang, ils étripent des cadavres et se livrent à des rituels occultes... Rafraîchissez-moi la mémoire, en quoi valent-ils mieux que ceux que nous tuons ? »
languages.original_text: "These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"

traits.locale_text: « Les tisseurs se baignent dans le sang, ils étripent des cadavres et se livrent à des rituels occultes... Rafraîchissez-moi la mémoire, en quoi valent-ils mieux que ceux que nous tuons ? »

languages.text: «Estos tejedores se bañan en sangre, destripan cadáveres y celebrar rituales siniestros... ¿en qué se diferencian estos cultistas de los que matamos?».
languages.original_text: "These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"

traits.locale_text: «Estos tejedores se bañan en sangre, destripan cadáveres y celebrar rituales siniestros... ¿en qué se diferencian estos cultistas de los que matamos?».

languages.text: 「ウェブスピナーたちは血を浴び、死体を抉り出し、怪しげな儀式を行う。魔女団は、私たちが殺した奴らより優れているの？」
languages.original_text: "These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"

traits.locale_text: 「ウェブスピナーたちは血を浴び、死体を抉り出し、怪しげな儀式を行う。魔女団は、私たちが殺した奴らより優れているの？」

languages.text: “那些织网者在血里洗澡，把尸体开膛破肚，还举行阴暗的仪式……提醒我一下，和死在我们手里的敌人相比，这群教徒到底哪里好了？”
languages.original_text: "These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"

traits.locale_text: “那些织网者在血里洗澡，把尸体开膛破肚，还举行阴暗的仪式……提醒我一下，和死在我们手里的敌人相比，这群教徒到底哪里好了？”

languages.original_text: "These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"

languages.text: "O ağ dokurları kanda yıkanır, cesetleri deşer ve şaibeli ayinler gerçekleştirir... Hafızamı tazeler misin? Bu tarikatçıların öldürdüklerimizden aşağı kalır yanı var mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "These webspinners bathe in blood, gut corpses, and perform shady rituals... Remind me, how are these cultists any better than the ones we kill?"
